reviews.sentence: 1. Economical 2. Booking through bokingcom resulted in around 30 cost saving as compared to walk in booking at the hotel. 3. Location it is located v close to expressway. Can reach 1st toll of expressway in 8 mins. 4. Staff friendly and helpful 5. Restaurant service they have a very basic menu but are quick1. Room lock was a problem. 2. WiFi was intermittent 3. AC was old an made noise. We had to put it off since we could not sleep with it on. Since it was winter we were OK.

Good Budget Hotel With Good Facilities. I happened to stay in this hotel just for a night stay with my family. and I am happy to say all of us very very satisfied with the quality of the hotel and the services available at an affordable price. Our family was on pilgrimage and it was very late almost 12 in the mid night and we were in a search of good family hotel just to spend a night. It was very difficult to find a suitable hotel at this hour of night and one thing clicked to my mind was to go to Ginger. LocationLocation of hotel is very good and convenient as it provide you easy access to all the directions. Being of Pune Bangalore Highway near Hinjewadi you can find most of your needs taken care. RomsRoms very pretty good and clean. The bed was comfortable. You can have different facilities available in the room like complementary water bottle tea coffee maker kettle with the tea coffee sugar kits Refrigerator a good size wardrobe work desk and a free wi fi facility. Initially we had a problem with our AC not working but the same was got corrected with 10 minutes by one of the support staff. Bathrooms Toilet were also very clean and neatly maintained. ServicesYou can enjoy your breakfast lunch and dinner at the restaurant located within the hotel. I can not write more about the food quality as we could not enjoy the same due to our need to rush in the morning. Only drawback I felt was shortage of staff compared to the rooms available in the hotel. Overall I can say this is the best hotel at a much reasonable and affordable price compared to the other hotels which gives full value of your money.

a lodge feeling. unhappy. the hotel is below average. all the staff right from reception to room service and housekeeping below average. more interested in tips than service and they make it very clear about it. We stayed there for five days and everyday the room service guy asked us when were we supposed to leave. Rooms were not maintained. The mattress pillows and duvets were smelly a c was too noisy and not cooling at all Telephone had some problem and we were nt able to call outside and everytime we complained we were bounced around. House keeping staff is nt interested in cleaning the room. Tables are never cleaned. Food is good but the restaurant staff is nt cordial. Wifi is pathetic.

Good stay. Great hotel to stay. Nice services. Courteous staff. Can improve on some services. Rest value for money. Booking done by make my trip. Got a good discount. So would recommend to have a make my trip account.

Worst stay ever. Worst hotel I have ever seen. Slow and sluggish service this hotel provided. Nortel present there was not working. So how could one order the food. In the food menu there was only 3 4 items. Rest was not available. Electricity was coming and going every 30 min. So overall it is a worst hotel to stay.
Average hospitality. Scope of improvement in terms of service quality of food.

Very poor facilities and staff. Very bad experience only taking money and not giving any service whichever mentioned on Makemytrip. Lift was not working given room on fourth floor staff is not ready to hear anything. Overall very bad experience.

Working staff in Restaurants d. Room is clean. Located in prime location. Ease of access. Rating 55Facilities Most of TV channels were not subscribed in airtel TV. Mostly Tamil channels. Rating 35Fod. Breakfast Dinner is good. Worth your money. Rating 4. 55Over all experience is 45.

Excellent stay at Ginger Pune. Excellent service. I had conversation with Swati and she was very kind and did all the needful for us. Hotel staff not only helped me but also our other guests. I would like to appreciate housekeeping team for maintaining the room neat and clean throughout the day.

Ginger Wakad rates below par. Terrible experience electricity kept tripping unhelpful reception tacky towels broken fittings broken glass pain in Room 023 smoke filed 027 and finally 018 very noisy and dust been packed with earlier left overs. Beyond Worst.

Price offered by MT. The price on MT was a great deal. The reception staff at Ginger were very courteous. Keep up the great job. The rooms were neat and clean. Everything was in working condition. The toilet was very clean too. Good part is that there is in house dining and room service available through the night for the late arrivers.
Very nice hotel with good staff prime location good food gym nice service.
Very good serviCe and good staff.

Feedback. This is the first time I have come down for dinner in ginger with family. The was very delicious and service was the best. And Mrmayur and mrvaibhav gave a really good service will definitely re visit Ginger.

Excellent Service Very good service and staff. Kitchen staff is very good. Mayur was very polite and excellent service. Dal bohra the chef food is very tasty. The chef food is very yummy. Room service good. Manager suhas us very generous and provide the best hotel service. The best place to be.
Comfortable stay. Courteous staff good service and value for money.
pleasant stay friendly courteous staff.
Great stay at Ginger. The hotel is well located in Wakad. The room was neat and clean. The restaurant served good food. Staff were courteous and helpful. Overall completely satisfied with the hotel.

Business Meeting stay hotel. We had booked this hotel loctaed in outskirts of Pune area known as Wakad. Nice clean good ambience hotel with dining facilties. In morning we had buffet breakfast which has ample varities of food items with juices fresh fruits bread jam egg south indian foods paratha poha and muffins. Staff is also very kind courteous rooms were cleaned with amentites.
Great place to stay. The staff was courteous the rooms were clean and tidy and the room were beautiful. Would recommend for the stay.
